meanings.sent1: The sponge had a foraminous structure, allowing water to flow through easily.
meanings.sent2: The foraminous rock was perfect for filtering water in the stream.
meanings.sent3: The foraminous pattern on the ceiling looked like a sky full of stars.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a foraminous sieve, letting some thoughts slip through unnoticed.
meanings.sent5: The foraminous texture of the bread made it light and airy.

meanings.definition: Full of small holes or openings
meanings.sent1: The foraminous sponge absorbed water quickly due to its many tiny holes.
meanings.sent2: The foraminous surface of the coral reef provided shelter for small fish.
meanings.sent3: The foraminous cheese resembled a piece of Swiss cheese with all its holes.
meanings.sent4: The foraminous clouds in the sky allowed glimpses of the sun to shine through.
meanings.sent5: The foraminous fabric allowed for good air circulation, perfect for hot summer days.
